letter.body: I'm writing this letter to inform you that I've been smoking Winston cigarettes for a very long time. Just recently, I purchased a carton of Winston Select cigarettes, and every pack in the carton was stale. Up until now, I must say that was one of your better customers. I hope this does not happen anymore. I would appreciate it if the company would try to take care of this problem.
letter.additional_note: I would appreciate it if the company would try to take care of this problem.
